p: Inclusion criteria were: type of article (meta-analysis, review, systematic review, observational study, case-control study, longitudinal/prospective study, retrospective study, randomized controlled trial), publication date (May 2005â€“December 2018), species (both human and animal), and in vitro studies. Priority was given to data from clinical trials in children; then, if not available, to clinical trials in adults and ultimately preclinical studies.
